events.content:
About the Event

The High-Tech Exchange 2025 is a three-day event organized by the Photonics Society Eindhoven. Our goal is to connect master's students, PhD candidates, and postdocs from across Europe with Brainport‚Äôs optics and photonics industry. Brainport Eindhoven is one of Europe‚Äôs leading technology hubs, home to over 5,000 tech and IT companies.

Participation in the event is completely free. Lunch, coffee breaks, and transportation to ASML will be provided for all participants.

We invite you to take part in:

  • ‚ú® Company talks and visits to leading photonics companies

  • üî¨ Laboratory and cleanroom tour at TU/e

  • üöÄ Career development workshops

  • üçª Poster session and networking activities

Program

  • Check out the exciting three-day program packed with industry visits, workshops, and networking opportunities:

Please note: the program is not final and may include more participating companies. The final version will be shared with all registered participants closer to the event date.

Registration closes May 5.
